params.archaeologistAddress: Address of accused archaeologist who is attempting to publish their private key
params.sarcoId: ID of sarcophagus archaeologist has attempted to publish a key on

params.privateKey: privateKey the archaeologist has attempted to publish
params.publicKey: publicKey stored for archaeologist on the sarcophagus

params.currentTime: Timestamp of the failed publish attempt
params.resurrectionTime: Time after which the sarcophagus can be resurrected

params.currentTime: Timestamp of the failed publish attempt
params.publishDeadline: Time after which the sarcophagus can no longer be resurrected  (resurrectionTime + gracePeriod)

params.privateKey: private key that has been published
params.sarcoId: ID of sarcophagus archaeologist has published the private key on

params.privateKey: The private key the archaeologist is publishing
params.sarcoId: The identifier of the sarcophagus for which the archaeologist is responsible

params.curseFee: The fee the archaeologist sets to roughly cover the cost of a publishPrivateKey transaction
params.freeBond: How much bond the archaeologist wants to deposit during the register call (if any)
params.maximumResurrectionTime: The time beyond which the archaeologist is not willing to accept new curses or rewraps
params.maximumRewrapInterval: The longest interval of time from a rewrap time the arch will accept for a resurrection
params.minimumDiggingFeePerSecond: The archaeologist's minimum amount to earn per second for being cursed
params.peerId: The libp2p identifier for the archaeologist

params.curseFee: The fee the archaeologist sets to roughly cover the cost of a publishPrivateKey transaction
params.freeBond: How much bond the archaeologist wants to deposit during the update call (if any)
params.maximumRewrapInterval: The longest interval of time from a rewrap time the arch will accept for a resurrection
params.minimumDiggingFeePerSecond: The archaeologist's minimum amount to earn per second for being cursed
params.peerId: The libp2p identifier for the archaeologist

ArchaeologistAlreadyPublishedPrivateKey(.notice: Archaeologist has attempted to publish a key for a sarcophagus twice

ArchaeologistHasBeenAccused(address,byte.notice: An archaeologist that has already been successfully accused has attempted to publish their private key

ArchaeologistPublishedIncorrectPrivateKe.notice: Archaeologist has attempted to publish the incorrect private key for a sarcophagus

CannotSetZeroProfileValue().notice: Archaeologist has attempted to set a zero minimumDiggingFeePerSecond or maximumRewrapInterval

TooEarlyForPublish(uint256,uint256).notice: Archaeologist has attempted to publish a key before the resurrection time

TooLateForPublish(uint256,uint256).notice: Archaeologist has attempted to publish a key after the end of the resurrection window

PublishPrivateKey(bytes32,bytes32,addres.notice: Emitted when an archaeologist successfully publishes their private key for a sarcophagus

depositFreeBond(uint256).notice: Deposits an archaeologist's free bond to the contract.

publishPrivateKey(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Publishes the private key for which the archaeologist is responsible during the sarcophagus resurrection window. Pays digging fees to the archaeologist and releases their locked bond. Cannot be called on a compromised or buried sarcophagus.

withdrawFreeBond(uint256).notice: Withdraws an archaeologist's free bond from the contract.

withdrawReward().notice: Withdraws all rewards from an archaeologist's reward pool
